expo.name: Coastwards

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to allow users to take pictures of coasts.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses the location to place the pictures of coasts taken by the user on a map.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app uses the Photo Library to allow users to choose existing images of coasts.

expo.description: Help Science study the risks of sea-level rise by uploading pictures of coasts.
